Others: The New York Yankees beat the Chicago Cubs 3-0 on Friday at Wrigley Field.
Aaron Judge hit an RBI double and scored on Austin Wellsâ€™ two-run single as the Yankees scored three times in the third inning.
Luis Gil pitched six sparkling innings in his return from a back injury.
Jordan Wicks allowed five hits and walked four in five innings in his second start since returning from a right oblique strain.
The Cubs were shut down by Gil and three relievers on a breezy afternoon.
Anthony Rizzo went 1-for-3 with a walk in his first game at Wrigley since the Cubs traded him to the Yankees in July 2021.
The Yankees improved to 2-2 on a six-game trip that began with a difficult series at Texas.
The Cubs lost for the third time in four games since a successful trip put them back in the conversation for the third NL wild-card spot.
